name: Knights of Rugnica
description:
Knights of Rugnica is an action-rpg game with emphasis on combat and exploration.

A tragic fate has befell you. You have died. But you've gained one more chance by making a pact with a witch.

Will you be able to pay the price of this pact? Or discover the culprit behind your unfortunate demise?

Try to find out.

Game features:

-fast paced real-time combat. Dispatch your enemies quickly using "break" system.

-item crafting

-dark and engaging story

Notice: this is an early alpha. It may not represent qualities of the final product.
